biblicalMessages.title: Biblical Messages
biblicalMessages.quote: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
biblicalMessages.quote2: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
biblicalMessages.quote3: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
biblicalMessages.quote4: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
biblicalMessages.quote5: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
biblicalMessages.inspirationText: Let these timeless words guide your daily walk with God. Each verse carries the power to transform your perspective and strengthen your faith.
biblicalMessages.reflection1: These words remind us of God's love and invite us to trust Him daily.
biblicalMessages.reflection2: This verse encourages us to rely on God's wisdom rather than our own understanding.
biblicalMessages.reflection3: A powerful reminder that God works all things together for our good.
biblicalMessages.reflection4: Through Christ, we have the strength to overcome any challenge.
biblicalMessages.reflection5: We can find peace by giving our worries to God, who cares for us deeply.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our prayer community and how to get the most out of your spiritual journey with us.
faq.faq1Question: How do I submit a prayer request?
faq.faq1Answer: Simply click on "Submit Prayer Request" and fill out the form with your prayer needs. You can choose to remain anonymous or share your name. Your request will be shared with our community for prayer support.
faq.faq2Question: Is my personal information kept private?
faq.faq2Answer: Yes, we respect your privacy. You can submit prayer requests anonymously, and we never share personal contact information. Only the prayer content you choose to share will be visible to the community.
faq.faq3Question: How often should I pray for others?
faq.faq3Answer: There's no set requirement, but we encourage daily prayer for community members. You can pray as often as you feel called to do so. Every prayer makes a difference in someone's life.
faq.faq4Answer: Absolutely! Our discussion groups are open to all members. You can join groups focused on different topics like Bible study, family faith, young adults, and more. Simply visit the Discussions page to get started.
faq.faq5Answer: Our platform supports 12 languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Romanian, and Hungarian. You can switch languages at any time.
faq.faq6Question: How can I get involved in the community?
faq.faq6Answer: There are many ways to get involved: submit prayer requests, pray for others, join discussion groups, share biblical messages, and participate in community events. Every interaction helps build our faith community.
faq.contactDescription: We're here to help! Contact us if you have any questions or need support.

about.title: About Us
about.missionText: My Prayer Community is dedicated to bringing people together through faith, hope, and prayer. We believe that prayer has the power to unite hearts across the world and provide comfort, support, and spiritual guidance to those who need it most.
about.missionText2: Our platform serves as a safe space where individuals can share their prayer requests, join meaningful discussions about faith, and connect with a supportive community that understands the power of prayer.
about.value1: Faith: We believe in the power of faith to transform lives
about.value2: Community: We foster a supportive and inclusive environment
about.value3: Prayer: We recognize prayer as a powerful tool for healing and connection
about.value4: Respect: We honor all beliefs and backgrounds
about.value5: Privacy: We protect the confidentiality of our community members
about.contactText: We would love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, suggestions, or need support, our team is here to help.
about.imprintNote: This website is operated by My Prayer Community. For any legal inquiries or concerns, please contact us at the email address provided above.
